item.title: Npc health glitch
item.dc:creator: @gary1988 gary1988
item.description:
@gary1988 wrote:

well as the title says, i add an npc, then go in to the npc.java set its hp but then it dosent have 600 like i set it has 350
as u can see where that 350 is located in npc.manager, an when i change that then there health changes, any ideas? coz im stumped =/

[code]}

	if (slot == -1) {
		return;
	}
	if (HP <= 0) { 
		HP = 350;[/code]

Read full topic
